coreAtributes.name: Leather Gauntlets
coreAtributes.description: A pair of heavy leather gloves, meant to be worn under plate armour gauntlets, but perfectly serviceable as work gloves. They're also capable of protecting your hands and forearms from minor physical assault, to boot.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull off your Leather Gauntlets.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull on your Leather Gauntlets.
replacementText.playerNPC: You pull [npc.name]'s Leather Gauntlets onto their hands.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You shove [npc.name]'s hands into their Leather Gauntlets.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] pulls your Leather Gauntlets onto your hands.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] shoves your hands into your Leather Gauntlets.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] pulls the Leather Gauntlets over [npc2.name]'s hands.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] shoves [npc2.name]'s hands into the Leather Gauntlets.
